attributes.action: Test symptomatic NHS staff for Covid-19 to avoid unnecessary 14 day isolation
attributes.additional_details: The current guidelines mean the entire household has to self isolate for 14 days when one member shows symptoms. This person may not even have Covid-19 and then a frontline NHS worker will not be able to work and potentially have to isolate further down the line and be off for an additional 2 weeks.
attributes.background: Test all symptomatic NHS staff for Covid-19 to avoid unnecessary 14 day isolation when they could be working.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304005.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
